sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as UTC_TAG_COUNT FROM log.source_register_table
WHERE ETL_UTC_TAG > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
AND (ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS IS NOT NULL)
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status is not null
			   and etl_utc_tag > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status like 'FAIL%'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [Trx_Type] != \'Actual\'\n  AND[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Trx_Amount!=Relation_Trx_Amount,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code = Relation_Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type = Relation_Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date = Relation_Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc = Relation_Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount = Relation_Trx_Amount,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		Trx_ID = Relation_Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as string,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as string,
		Trx_ID as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AdjustmentLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT [Asset_ID]\n	,[Asset_Name]\n	,[Asset_Curency]\n	,[Fund_ID]\n	,[Asset_Alloc_Per]\n	,[Asset_country]\n	,[Fund_Region]\n	,[Fund_State]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Name]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Company]\n    ,[start_datetime]\n	,[process_name]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Name = Asset_Name,
		Relation_Asset_Curency = Asset_Curency,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per = Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Relation_Asset_country = Asset_country,
		Relation_Fund_Region = Fund_Region,
		Relation_Fund_State = Fund_State,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name = Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company = Prop_Mgr_Company,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name = Relation_Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency = Relation_Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per = Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country = Relation_Asset_country,
		Fund_Region = Relation_Fund_Region,
		Fund_State = Relation_Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Version_Name]\n      ,[Budget_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Budget_Type]\n      ,[Budget_Date]\n      ,[Budget_Desc]\n      ,[Budget_value]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Budgets]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Desc,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Desc,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Budget_value!=Relation_Budget_value || Cash_Flow_Code!=Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Version_Name = Version_Name,
		Relation_Budget_ID = Budget_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Budget_Type = Budget_Type,
		Relation_Budget_Date = Budget_Date,
		Relation_Budget_Desc = Budget_Desc,
		Relation_Budget_value = Budget_value,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Budget_ID = Relation_Budget_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type = Relation_Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date = Relation_Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc = Relation_Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value = Relation_Budget_value,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name = Relation_Version_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput sink(input(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as string,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Version_Name,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[GL_Desc]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[GL_Parent_Code]\n      ,[GL_Level_Code]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[end_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code,GL_Parent_Code,GL_Level_Code)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code,GL_Parent_Code,GL_Level_Code)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_GL_Desc = GL_Desc,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_GL_Parent_Code = GL_Parent_Code,
		Relation_GL_Level_Code = GL_Level_Code,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_end_datetime = end_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		GL_Desc = Relation_GL_Desc,
		Category = Relation_Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code = Relation_GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code = Relation_GL_Level_Code,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT CONCAT(TRX.[Trx_Code],\'-\',FUN.[Fund_ID]) AS Trx_Code\n      ,FUN.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n	  ,TRX.GL_Code\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n	  ,CASE WHEN COA.[GL_Code] IS NULL THEN \'NO GL_CODE DURING LOAD\' ELSE COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n  FROM [staging].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.[GL_Code] = COA.[GL_Code] AND COA.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Fund] FUN\n  ON TRX.[Fund_ID] = FUN.[Company_Name] AND FUN.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Asset] ASS\n  ON TRX.[Asset_ID] = ASS.[Asset_ID] AND FUN.[Fund_ID] = ASS.[Fund_ID] AND ASS.[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		Trx_Type = toString('Actual')) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(Trx_Desc!='Beginning Balance:',
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance, TrxCodeBeginningBalance)
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns sink(input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,0),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRow
